candidates.title: yubikey-cli v0.6.0
candidates.body:

- Bump `yubikey` dependency to v0.6 ([#403])

candidates.title: Bump p384 from 0.10.0 to 0.11.2

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Bumps [p384](https://github.com/RustCrypto/elliptic-curves) from 0.10.0 to 0.11.2.
Commits
  • 0320835 p384 v0.11.2 (#633)
  • b52672c build(deps): bump elliptic-curve from 0.12.2 to 0.12.3 (#632)
  • 6a45794 Implement ZeroizeOnDrop for k256::ecdsa::SigningKey and k256::schnorr::Signin...
  • 3f63a1d build(deps): bump sha3 from 0.10.1 to 0.10.2 (#629)
  • c48ae66 k256: add RFC6979 test vector (#628)
  • ecc87f0 p384: re-export low-level diffie_hellman function (#627)
  • 41f6f30 build(deps): bump criterion from 0.3.5 to 0.3.6 (#622)
  • ec32b1f k256 v0.11.3 (#619)
  • e1d2d1e Bump elliptic-curve to v0.12.2 (#616)
  • 02b2dea build(deps): bump ecdsa from 0.14.2 to 0.14.3 (#614)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=p384&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.10.0&new-version=0.11.2)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. candidates.title: cli: migrate from `gumdrop` to `clap` v3
candidates.body: `gumdrop` was originally chosen for its minimalist set of dependencies, but `clap` v3 has a slimmed down set of dependencies and better UX.

candidates.title: RustCrypto crate upgrades; MSRV 1.57
candidates.body:
Updates all of the RustCrypto dependencies to the latest versions:

- `des` v0.8
- `elliptic-curve` v0.12
- `hmac` v0.12
- `num-bigint-dig` v0.8
- `pbkdf2` v0.11
- `p256` v0.11
- `p384` v0.10
- `rsa` v0.6
- `sha1` v0.10 (replacing `sha-1`)
- `sha2` v0.10

candidates.title: Bump uuid from 0.8.2 to 1.0.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Bumps [uuid](https://github.com/uuid-rs/uuid) from 0.8.2 to 1.0.0.
Release notes

Sourced from uuid's releases.

1.0.0

This release includes a huge amount of work from a lot of contributors. These notes are duplicated from 1.0.0-alpha.1 since they're relevant for anybody moving from 0.8.2 to 1.0.0.

Changes since the last release

https://github.com/uuid-rs/uuid/compare/0.8.2...main

Contributions since the last release

  • #510
  • #482

  • 286134f prepare for 1.0.0 release
  • 43905eb Merge pull request #595 from spruceid/remove-and
  • 444ef96 Remove unnecessary AND
  • 5f649d7 Merge pull request #592 from uuid-rs/KodrAus-patch-1
  • 92ad25f update contact details in the CoC
  • 767f519 Merge pull request #591 from uuid-rs/fix/macro-diagnostics
  • 8b043af use the parsed literal as the span source for errors
  • f0d5956 Merge pull request #587 from uuid-rs/feat/fast-sha1
  • 165b7eb move to sha1_smol as the new name for the current library
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

candidates.title: Cargo.lock: update dependencies & fix cargo audit
2021 edition upgrade; MSRV 1.56
candidates.body:
Changes the `edition` to 2021 in both the `yubikey` and `yubikey-cli` crates.

Removes `TryFrom`/`TryInto` imports, now that they're in the prelude.

candidates.title: yubikey v0.5.0
candidates.body:
### Changed
- Update `rsa` dependency to 0.5 ([#315])
- Update `pbkdf2` dependency to 0.9 ([#315])
- Update `x509-parser` dependency to 0.12 ([#315], [#322])
- Update `nom` to v7.0 ([#322])

[#315]: https://github.com/iqlusioninc/yubikey.rs/pull/315
[#322]: https://github.com/iqlusioninc/yubikey.rs/pull/322
